name: Metal Tales: Fury of the Guitar Gods
description: Metal Tales: Fury of the Guitar Gods mixes Metal with pure adrenaline, to deliver the ultimate 3D roguelike shooter.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: Dual Core processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 capable hardware Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: 64bit OS recommended but not required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Quad core processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 460 or better Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Recommended game if you like Metal and action games. This one is pretty straight forward: Enter a room, beat all enemies and continue. So far i haven't finished the game yet, but since you can get permanent upgrades, the permadeath is not so punishing and the game gets a little bit easier with those. I highly recommend buying first of all the powerslide upgrade.
